name: Toad
description: A unified interface for AI in the terminal that provides a seamless, integrated terminal experience for AI-powered coding assistance. Created by Will McGugan (creator of Textual and Rich Python libraries), Toad acts as a universal UI for agentic coding, supporting AI agents like Claude and others. It takes inspiration from Jupyter and works well with WSL, with native Windows support on the roadmap.
community_quotes: A unified experience for AI in the terminal - fixing the fragmented AI coding experiences
Takes inspiration from Jupyter for a seamless terminal AI workflow
Built by Will McGugan, creator of Textual and Rich - bringing TUI expertise to AI coding
Universal UI for agentic coding in the terminal
Continued innovation in terminal-based AI interfaces
